apps.name: MiniMirror
apps.subtitle: MiniMirror is the fastest way to access your front-facing camera.
apps.localizedDescription: MiniMirror is the fastest way to access your front-facing camera. Designed for iOS 18+, it includes a Lock Screen control for one-tap access and a clean, distraction-free mirror interface.

versions.localizedDescription:
• Initial release of MiniMirror
• Opens the front-facing camera instantly for quick mirror access
• Adds a Lock Screen control for one-tap launch
• Adds a Control Centre toggle for even faster access
• Optimized for low-latency camera startup
• No onboarding, no clutter, just open an check yourself out

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Need camera access to act as a mirror.
